plan.implementation_approach: Add null check in list comprehension at line 83 to raise clear ValueError with index information

changes.description: Add None validation in from_dict classmethod to raise clear ValueError when data is None
Filter out null items in load() list comprehension before calling Todo.from_dict

commit.message: fix: handle null items in JSON array gracefully (fixes #2566)

risks: Silent filtering of null items may hide data corruption issues
Users with JSON files containing nulls will have those items silently removed on next save
summary: Candidate #3 implements null item handling by filtering out None values in the storage layer and adding explicit None validation in Todo.from_dict. This approach prioritizes data recovery (loading valid items) over strict validation (rejecting the entire file).
